dialogs.patient: Hi Doctor, I am having Chest tightness and shortness of breath
dialogs.doctor: In that case, do you have any Night sweats?
In that case, do you have any Cough?
In that case, do you have any Fever?

dialogs.patient: Yes Doctor, I am feeling that as well

dialogs.doctor: In that case, you might be suffering from Pneumonia. Let me prescribe some antibiotics for you.
